description: Lew Rubens is a world-renowned bondage expert, famous for his creative suspension bondage. Wenona is back at Hogtied with a stronger, leaner, ripped body. Even sporting a twelve pack and toned, muscular body, Wenona still cannot escape the harsh rope. This update is a bondage lovers dream. Hogtied is about wondrous variety, thanks Lew and nice work.
title: Wenona and Lew Rubens
